attributes.action: reform Local Planning Authorities so that they contain members suitably qualified to determine the quality of a proposed design. It is no longer permissible for companies such as Barratt, Persimmon and Redrow to act with total disregard for the spirit and individuality of a location. We expect designs that are specific to each project and provide innovative and sensitive solutions to housing developments in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
